message: Hi there! 👋 I'm Yuhasa, your AI history tutor. Ask me anything about history or click one of the suggestions above to get started!

Unfortunately, this textbook doesn't contain any information about Alexander the Great.  The provided excerpts cover various historical events and figures, focusing primarily on industrial revolutions, colonial history (particularly of Sri Lanka and America), and major world wars.  To learn about Alexander the Great, you'll need to consult a different resource.
